about_the_game:
Lucrom City’s notorious asylum has been overrun by a recently caught sadistic mastermind - the Unraveler. He’s willing to negotiate before he starts killing the hostages on one condition. He gets to speak to one person - Hank, his captor.

Hank: The Great Unraveling is a narrative-driven game built around a number of unique time manipulation mechanics.



Features

  • Hank - a burnt-out vigilante, entrapped by his own time-traveling superpowers.
  • Time Manipulation - rewind time and use the knowledge of the future to escape with your life.
  • Dynamic Dialog System - talk and interact with the world at the same time and see how your interlocutor reacts to your actions.
  • Comic Book Aesthetics.

content_descriptors.notes: One of the main themes of the game is struggle with alcohol addiction
